segments.text: Every country should face the history .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , we don ’ t live in the vacuum . We have traditional values and long but different history .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes , we , human beings , really had done something wrong , so we should admit it at first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there is always somebody who wants to turn his back on the true history .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe such things won ’ t be realized , just daydreaming .
segments.speaker: S1
